```{r}

library(microbenchmark)
source("C:\Users\hanus\Desktop\PS05\s610_ps5\llr_functions.Rmd")
x <- french_fries$potato
y <- french_fries$buttery
z <- z
omega <- 32

benchmark_result <- microbenchmark(
  llr_results <- llr(x, y, z, omega),
  times <- 100
)

cat("Minimum execution time of llr: ", min(benchmark_result$time/1000000), "milliseconds\n")
cat("Mean execution time of llr: ", mean(benchmark_result$time/1000000), "milliseconds\n")
print(benchmark_result)
```
